0.name: Alice
0.text: Heya! Did you know that not only you can eat Bread, but you can also [color]turn it into Crumbs[/color]?

1.name: Alice
1.text: If you use the Crumbs in a fight, you can [color]instantly escape from battle[/color].

2.name: Alice
2.text: I heard long ago, people would use them to go back on their tracks when they got lost.

3.name: Alice
3.text: Though, they tended to attract bugs and cause problems, so people stopped doing that.

4.name: Alice
4.text: Rumor says some guy even got lost in a ghost town where everything's white.
